name: Border Patrol 3D
description:
Crime is threatening your borders, and it’s your turn to stop it!

Stop the oncoming cars as you begin your assessment. Think they look suspicious? Then it’s time to inspect the car. Open up tires, seats, and any other nook and cranny that you can think of. Once you find any hidden cash, it’s time to arrest the driver!

Are you up to the task?

Border Patrol 3D features:
-Catch the culprit
-Exciting visuals
-Patrol the border
